basics.label: Director of Business Development
basics.summary: Award-winning sales & marketing executive with extensive experience in growing and exceeding sales in multi-million dollar business operations in various industries. Pragmatic and results orientated, focused on bottom line results, with a proven track record of achieving and exceeding the standards of performance set out for any sales project. Skilled in utilizing technology as a tool to improve organizational efficiency.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for growing the Baptist Portfolio of eleven outpatient facilities in the Fort Lauderdale market. Developed business plans and initiatives to assess new markets, analyze business opportunities etc.

work.name: Director of Business Development Company Name
work.summary: Formed strategic partnerships and negotiated contracts with mass retailers and distributor's which resulted in the Greenie Tots product line being sold in national Fortune 500 accounts etc.

work.name: Pharmaceutical Sales Representative 2 Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for a portfolio of billion dollar revenue medications including Lipitor®, Viagra®, Celebrex®, Lyrica®, Chantix®, Toviaz®, and Premarin® to increase market base and change physician prescribing habits etc.
highlights: Winner:Florida South Turn Up The Heat Contest, Top Performer Award (2007, 2006,2005,& 2004).

work.name: Intern Company Name
work.summary: Developed and maintained monthly expense budget reports for entire Managed Care sales force (NHO) to evaluate budget spending & Developed and maintained monthly expense budget reports for entire Managed Care sales force (NHO) to evaluate budget spending & allocation of resources etc.
